verses.verse: And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they bring<WH3947> me an offering<WH8641>: of every man<WH376> that gives it willingly<WH5068> with his heart<WH3820> you shall take<WH3947> my offering<WH8641>.
And this is the offering<WH8641> which you shall take<WH3947> of them<WH2091>; gold, and silver<WH3701>, and brass<WH5178>,
And blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8438>, and fine linen<WH8336>, and goats<WH5795>' hair,
And rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red<WH119>, and badgers<WH8476>' skins<WH5785>, and acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>,
Oil<WH8081> for the light<WH3974>, spices<WH1314> for anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and for sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>,
Onyx<WH7718> stones<WH68>, and stones<WH68> to be set<WH4394> in the ephod<WH646>, and in the breastplate<WH2833>.
And let them make<WH6213> me a sanctuary<WH4720>; that I may live<WH7931> among them<WH8432>.
According to all that I show<WH7200> you after the pattern<WH8403> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and the pattern<WH8403> of all the instruments<WH3627> there even so shall you make it<WH6213>.

And they shall make<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>: two cubits<WH520> and a half<WH2677> shall be the length<WH753> there and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> the breadth<WH7341> there and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> the height there<WH6967>

And you shall overlay<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, inside<WH1004> and outside<WH2351> shall you overlay<WH6823> it<WH6213>, and shall make upon it a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> round about<WH5439>.

And you shall cast<WH3332> four<WH702> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> for it<WH5414>, and put them in the four<WH702> corners<WH6471> there and two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> shall be in the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of it<WH8147>, and two rings<WH2885> in the other side of it<WH8145>.
And you shall make<WH6213> poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlay<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>.
And you shall put<WH935> the poles<WH905> into the rings<WH2885> by the sides<WH6763> of the ark<WH727>, that the ark<WH727> may be borne with them<WH5375>.
The poles<WH905> shall be<WH1961> in the rings<WH2885> of the ark<WH727>: they shall not be taken from it<WH5493>.
And you shall put<WH5414> into the ark<WH727> the testimony<WH5715> which I shall give you<WH5414>

And you shall make<WH6213> a mercy seat<WH3727> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>: two cubits<WH520> and a half<WH2677> shall be the length<WH753> there and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> the breadth there<WH7341>
And you shall make<WH6213> two<WH8147> cherubims<WH3742> of gold<WH2091>, of beaten work<WH4749> shall you make<WH6213> them<WH8147>, in the two ends<WH7098> of the mercy seat<WH3727>.

And make<WH6213> one<WH259> cherub<WH3742> on the one end<WH7098>, and the other<WH259> cherub<WH3742> on the other<WH2088> end<WH7098>: even of the mercy seat<WH3727> shall you make<WH6213> the cherubims<WH3742> on the two<WH8147> ends there<WH7098>

And the cherubims<WH3742> shall stretch<WH6566> forth their wings<WH3671> on high<WH4605>, covering<WH5526> the mercy seat<WH3727> with their wings<WH3671>, and their faces<WH6440> shall look one<WH376> to another<WH251>; toward the mercy seat<WH3727> shall the faces<WH6440> of the cherubims be<WH3742>.
And you shall put<WH5414> the mercy seat<WH3727> above<WH4605> upon the ark<WH727>; and in the ark<WH727> you shall put<WH5414> the testimony<WH5715> that I shall give you<WH5414>

And there I will proper<WH3259> with you and I will commune<WH1696> with you from above the mercy seat<WH3727>, from between<WH996> the two<WH8147> cherubims<WH3742> which are upon<WH5921> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, of all things which I will give you in commandment<WH6680> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

You shall also make<WH6213> a table<WH7979> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>: two cubits<WH520> shall be the length<WH753> there and a cubit<WH520> the breadth<WH7341> there and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> the height there<WH6967>
And you shall overlay<WH6823> it with pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>, and make<WH6213> thereto a crown<WH2213> of gold<WH2091> round about<WH5439>.

And you shall make<WH6213> unto it a border<WH4526> of an hand breadth<WH2948> round about<WH5439>, and you shall make<WH6213> a golden<WH2091> crown<WH2213> to the border<WH4526> there round about<WH5439>.
And you shall make<WH6213> for it four<WH702> rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091>, and put<WH5414> the rings<WH2885> in the four<WH702> corners<WH6285> that are on the four<WH702> feet there<WH7272>
Over against<WH5980> the border<WH4526> shall the rings<WH2885> be for places<WH1004> of the poles<WH905> to carry<WH5375> the table<WH7979>.
And you shall make<WH6213> the poles<WH905> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and overlay<WH6823> them with gold<WH2091>, that the table<WH7979> may be carried with them<WH5375>.

And you shall make<WH6213> the dishes<WH7086> there and spoons<WH3709> there and covers<WH7184> there and bowls<WH4518> there to cover<WH5258> with<WH2004>: of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091> shall you make them<WH6213>.
And you shall set<WH5414> upon the table<WH7979> showbread<WH3899> before<WH6440> me always<WH8548>.

And you shall make<WH6213> a lampstand<WH4501> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>: of beaten work<WH4749> shall the lampstand<WH4501> be made<WH6213>: his shaft<WH3409>, and his branches<WH7070>, his bowls<WH1375>, his buds<WH3730>, and his flowers<WH6525>, shall be of the same.

And six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> shall come<WH3318> out of the sides<WH6654> of it<WH7969>; three branches<WH7070> of the lampstand<WH4501> out of the one<WH259> side<WH6654>, and three<WH7969> branches<WH7070> of the lampstand<WH4501> out of the other<WH8145> side<WH6654>:

Three<WH7969> bowls<WH1375> made like unto almonds<WH8246>, with a bud<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525> in one<WH259> branch<WH7070>; and three<WH7969> bowls<WH1375> made like almonds<WH8246> in the other<WH259> branch<WH7070>, with a bud<WH3730> and a flower<WH6525>: so in the six<WH8337> branches<WH7070> that come<WH3318> out of the lampstand<WH4501>.
And in the lampstand<WH4501> shall be four<WH702> bowls<WH1375> made like unto almonds<WH8246>, with their buds<WH3730> and their flowers<WH6525>.

And there shall be a bud<WH3730> under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of the same<WH3730>, and a bud under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of the same<WH3730>, and a bud under two<WH8147> branches<WH7070> of the same<WH8337>, according to the six branches<WH7070> that proceed<WH3318> out of the lampstand<WH4501>.
Their buds<WH3730> and their branches<WH7070> shall be of the same<WH259>: all it shall be one beaten work<WH4749> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>.
And you shall make<WH6213> the seven<WH7651> lamps<WH5216> there and they shall light<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> there that they may give light<WH215> over against<WH5676> it<WH6440>.
And the snuffers<WH4457> there and the snuffdishes<WH4289> there shall be of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091>.
Of a talent<WH3603> of pure<WH2889> gold<WH2091> shall he make<WH6213> it<WH3627>, with all these vessels.
And look<WH7200> that you make<WH6213> them after their pattern<WH8403>, which was showed<WH7200> you in the mountain<WH2022>.
